article.title: BOOK REVIEWS
article.abstract:
Book reviewed in this article:
Capital Budgeting Techniques. By F. M. Wilkes.
National Monetary Policies and International Financial Markets. By Richard J. Herring and Richard C. Marston.
By Robert Solomon. The International Monetary System, 1945–1976.
Foreign Direct Investment, Industrialization, and Social Change. By Stephen Jay Korbrin.
Revisited Monetary History Revisited. By P. Temin.
Bank Holding Companies and the Public Interest. By Michael A. Jessee and Steven A. Seelig.
Evolution, Welfare and Time in Economics: Essays in Honor of Nicholas Georgescu‐Roegen. Edited by Anthony M. Tang, Fred M. Westfield, and Ames S. Worley.
Lectures on the Theory of Production. By Luigi L. Pasinetti.
Toward Full Employment and Price Stability. By Paul McCracken, et al.
